Title: Legend in the Making
Plot: After the events in Canada, Bette is on the run from authorities with her daughter. Shane reverts back to her old habits but gets a surprise from her father's wife. Meanwhile, Helena tries to get used to living without her mother's money, Max attends a support group, and Kit has trouble with her pregnancy.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Contains drug use, sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Karina Lombard,  Layla Barron,  Camille Atebe,  Oscar Parry,  Paul Anthony,  Evin Taylor,  Jane Lynch,  DJ Hicks,  Kristopher Shepard,  Chuck Mayne,  Sarah-Jane Redmond,  Victoria Bidewell,  Sandra  Timuss,  Elod
